summary: Lady is lev 42 Nord just finished Stormcloaks quest. I put my game here so others can play dawnguard without all the beginning quests.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry, i forgot there is one tiny little cheat on this mod, i set carry limit up to 5000 because i was transferring alot of stuff around. Sorry, have fun with me.

Lady is lev 42 Nord just finished Stormcloaks quest, Companions Quest, and is up to Diplomatic Immunity in main quest. Has not started Dawnguard yet.Owns Breezehome . No Cheats, i worked hard to get her here. She should be naked when you get her, so you can dress her as you like.  She is an Archer, and is married to Lament the Vampire I made from this mod===>http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24089/    Sorry for being married.

WARNING DAWNGUARD NEEDED
You must have ApachiiHair running for this mod. Make sure it is before her n the order.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
and
ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 32,
Standalone 10 New Female hairs - 
I cant remember where i got the blood on the lips from, when i do ill add it, sorry
